content.prompt: The main purpose of the repetition of negative diction in the middle of the second paragraph (“and with no side-path . . . very halls of their friends”) is to emphasize the difference between the

choices.label: grand mansions and the small-town setting
natural light and the artificial light
welcoming homes and the dangerous streets

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
